dark.desc: Notify the component that the background is a dark color

animation.desc: The animation effect of the skeleton placeholder
animation.desc_cn: 骨架占位符的动画效果

square.desc: Removes border-radius so borders are squared

bordered.desc: Applies a default border to the component
bordered.desc_cn: 将默认边框应用于零部件

size.desc: Size in CSS units, including unit name; Overrides 'height' and 'width' props and applies the value to both height and width
size.desc_cn: 带有 CSS 单位的尺寸大小，包括单位的名称；覆盖“height”和“width”属性，并将值同时应用于height和width

width.desc: Width in CSS units, including unit name; Apply custom width; Use this prop or through CSS; Overridden by 'size' prop if used
width.desc_cn: CSS单位宽度，包括单位名称；应用自定义宽度；使用此属性或通过CSS；如果使用了“size”属性，则被它覆盖

height.desc: Height in CSS units, including unit name; Apply custom height; Use this prop or through CSS; Overridden by 'size' prop if used
height.desc_cn: 以CSS单位表示的高度，包括单位名称；应用自定义高度；使用此属性或通过CSS；如果使用了“size”属性，则被它覆盖

default.desc: Default slot in the devland unslotted content of the component
default.desc_cn: 组件的devland unslotted内容中的默认插槽
